channel.title: If(findcolor(x,y,color bla bla bla... Need help :P
channel.description: I need help! I am making a auto make-account-and-then-login-and-do-tutorial-island. :P But the problem is, when Runescape Client is loading, i use "if(findcolor function, but i want i want it to kind a repeat until it find the color. Yellow... Help? =)

item.title: If(findcolor(x,y,color bla bla bla... Need help :P
item.dc:creator: @Boreas Boreas
item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

uptext functions read the text in top left corner that appears when you mouse over something, no matter what color that something is. For example when you put the mouse over the ess mine, it says ‘Mine essence’ or something HINT HINT

Read full topic

item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

Yea, tutorial island is very annoying. Just the fact that it’s not a repeated set of actions makes it an ambitious project. Congrats on the account maker. And remember for the air crafter that the falador road color is different to the road color outside.

I ROCK! xD

item.title: If(findcolor(x,y,color bla bla bla... Need help :P
item.dc:creator: @ScarScape ScarScape
item.description:
@ScarScape wrote:

[quote=“KyleGut3, post:5, topic:9568”]or Like this:

[scar]While(not(FindColor(x,y,color,0,0,548,362))) do wait(100);[/scar][/quote]
Hehhe that was new for me too.

Read full topic

item.title: If(findcolor(x,y,color bla bla bla... Need help :P
item.dc:creator: @ScarScape ScarScape
item.description:
@ScarScape wrote:

Do it like this repeat Wait(1000) until(FindColor(x,y,2104604,0,0,548,362)) This should work.
You mustn’t put “if” into there.

Read full topic
